title: A. Cold. Day. In. Hell. 2011. DVDRip. Xvi D

sources.title: A. Cold. Day. In. Hell. 2011. Dvdrip. Xvi D
sources.description: Sierra Nevada Mountains, 1887: William Drayton, once a crack sharpshooter in the Civil War, has lost his wife and home. He has ascended to the high country, wanting never to be heard from again.
